ARABIC: قُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْعِلْمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'The knowledge is with Allah alone and I am only a clear warner.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "God alone has knowledge. My duty is only to warn you clearly."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say: “Allah alone knows about that; and I am no more than a plain warner.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "God knows best. I am only one who gives warning".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Proclaim, “Surely Allah has its knowledge; and I am only a Herald of plain warning.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "The knowledge is with Allah only, and I am only a plain warner."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: The knowledge (thereof is only with Allah and I am only a plain warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'The knowledge is with God; I am only a clear warner.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: The knowledge is with Allah only, and I am but a plain warner;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "God alone has knowledge of that; and I am only a plain warner."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: the knowledge is only with Allah, and but a warner manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘Its knowledge is only with Allah; I am only a manifest warner.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "As to the knowledge of the time, it is with Allah alone: I am (sent) only to warn plainly in public."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "The knowledge (of its exact time) is with Allah only, and I am only a plain warner."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'The knowledge (of that) is with Allah; I am only a clear warner'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “Knowledge is with God, and I am only a clear warner.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "The knowledge is only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [67:26] Say: ‘The knowledge, of its coming, is only with God, and I am but a plain warner’, one whose warning is plain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) to them, Muhammad: (The knowledge) of the coming of the Hour and of the befalling of chastisement (is with Allah only, and I am but a plain warner) a warning messenger speaking to you with a language you understand;
